mapper.select: select group_concat(sksav.spu_sale_attr_value_id order by spsav.spu_sale_attr_id asc separator '|' ) sku_sale_attr_value_permutation, sku_id from sku_sale_attr_value sksav inner join spu_sale_attr_value spsav on spsav.id=sksav.spu_sale_attr_value_id inner join sku_info on sksav.sku_id=sku_info.id and sku_info.is_sale=1 where sksav.spu_id=#{spuId} group by sksav.sku_id
